description: Publisher which connects to Fiserv Signature Core

ConnectionString.title: Connection String
ConnectionString.description: The ODBC connection string with (optional) PASSWORD in place for your connection secret.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: (Optional) The secret of your connection string. Will replace PASSWORD in the connection string.

LightSync.title: Light Sync
LightSync.description: Enable automatic sync of deleted records ever 30 minutes for real time reads.

SingleRealTimeSettings.title: Singe Run Real Time Settings
SingleRealTimeSettings.description: Configuration for running single read operations with real time capabilities. When omitted reads will not leverage real time features.

TableInformation.title: Table Information
TableInformation.description: Information about the tables to monitor for changes.

TargetJournalLibrary.title: Target Journal Library
TargetJournalLibrary.description: The name of the library the target journal file is in.

TargetJournalName.title: Target Journal Name
TargetJournalName.description: The name of the Journal file to query for changes.

TargetTableLibrary.title: Target Table Library
TargetTableLibrary.description: The name of the library the target table file is in.

TargetTableName.title: Target Table Name
TargetTableName.description: The name of the table file being monitored for changes.

TargetTableAlias.title: Target Table Alias
TargetTableAlias.description: The alias of the table file as defined in the query being monitored for changes.
